nodes.title: Update gradle wrapper and dependency versions
Add fix for nullable text edits
Fix multiple text edit handling for a single document
Enhance support for LSP inspections and update documentation
Enhance support for language id passing when document open
Add support for async and cancellable completion proposal contributor
Expose project and RequestManager bound to current language client
Fix NPE at LSPInspection when the virtual file is null.
Fix triggering LS from different windows
Fix NPE when opening attached source files
Fix NPE when trying to open virual files which doesn't exist
Fix NPE in symbol provider when there are no LS started.
Fix completion insertion and caret positioning
Revamp diagnostics implementation and add IDEA 2019.x compatibility
Add initial support for listening to server responses
Language client context and custom language client implementation.
Support for LSP Spec 3 initialized request handling
Add bug fixes and improve stability
Add support for file name patterns for server registration
Add support for resetting a failed or timed out language server
Add LSPSymbolContributor for showing symbols from LSP client
Add support for language id and initialized message
Update intellij gradle plugin version to latest
Add support for multiple file extensions
Add diagnostics and code action support
Add initial implementation with language server based completion support
Fix versioning error and add CodeActionLiteralSupport
dont let hovers run over whole screen (just this one dirty trick...)
make hover more readable in darkmode
fixes multiple problems with split / preview editors
use custom prefix matching to allow server to control insertion deter…
fixes removal of listeners in case another editor w/same uri is closed
Enhancement: Starting connections without opening an Editor first
fix NPE #210 and respond according to spec; propose less intrusive showMessage/Request() ui
Fix multiple bugs and extends capabilities
Do not reopen files when writable status changes
Add spotbugs plugin and improve code
upgrade with backward compat to lsp4j 0.9.0
Add support for passing in symbol pattern as a query
Fixed compatibility issues with upcoming IJ release
Fixed compatibility issues with upcoming IJ release
Add minor fixes and refactor code
Add minor fix for live template generation
Fix build failure due to outdated licence headers
Fix invalid source navigation and fatal error in IDEA 2019.3
Fix langserver connections are not being initialized for already opened editors at IDE startup
Add fix for invalid source navigation when tab characters are present
Fix potential memory leak in IntellijLanguageClient
[Action] bind the action register with caret changed listener replaci…
Add process builder based server definition support,refactor code and improve documentation
[Annotation][QuickFix] the register action logic is after mouse cursor moving on diagnostic annotation, and modify it to createAnnotation logic
Add LSP snippet (intellij live templates) support
[BUG] fix the invalid path bug, the uri maybe null when the path is i…
fix rename bug, editor does not hasFocus when using rename from menu
Add support for file content based connection to LS
Add support for quick doc hovers (support for opening files)
Add LabelProvider for LPS elements such as symbols.
Send a DidChangeWatchedFiles event when the files are renamed
Fix NPE when symbol file are null due to LS symbol errors.
Add support for customize icons from LS client implementation.
Fix fatal error due to disposed editors
Add proper shutdown support when closing IDE window
Add support for properly shutting down language servers
Fix not sending didChangeWatchedFiles for open document.
Update symbol contributor to new API
Fix NPEs in LSP project event listener and completion icon provider
Improve status widget handling and add few other minor improvements
Add support to preserve language connections when renaming/ moving connected files
Navigate to line/column in goto definition/references
Replace "ctrl" key functionality to "command" key in mac os
tiny change to Reformat , so that it will be the same user experience as Java in Intellij IDEA
Add minor fix for renaming support
Fix disposed project issue when shutting down language server
